elements.text:
Your friend convinces you to go on a walk through a local park. You have heard that there are poisonous snakes in that park.

Here are some behaviors that someone might do at that moment or in the future:

text: I want to tell my friend that I can't go, but push myself to go into the park anyway.
I tell my friend I'm ready to go.
I think about telling my friend that we should go on a walk somewhere else, but decide that it'll be OK if we walk in the park.
I put on a jacket and go outside.
I call my friend and say that I'm busy all of a sudden.
